mapper.insert: insert into gardenReserve(reserve_no, garden_no, GARDEN_NAME, member_No, VISIT_DATE, visit_time, ADULT_MEM, CHILD_MEM, DISAB_MEM, TOTAL_PRICE) values (res_sequence.nextval, #{gardenNo}, #{gardenName}, #{memberNo}, to_date(#{visitDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{visitTime}, #{adultMem}, #{childMem}, #{disabMem}, #{totalPrice})
mapper.select: select reserve_no from (select reserve_no from gardenReserve where member_No = #{memberNo} order by reserve_no desc) where rownum = 1
mapper.insert: update gardenReserve set qr_code = #{qrImgName} where reserve_no = #{resNo}
